content.rendered:
Directed by Atsuko Hirayanagi. Ryûichi Hiroki. Kiyoshi Kurosawa. Naoko Ogigami. Naoko Yamada. Nobuhiro Yamashita

Written by Atsuko Hirayanagi. Hisako Kurosawa. Kiyoshi Kurosawa. Naoko Ogigami. Yukari Tatsui

Cast Ren Hanami( Natsuko4 episodes, 2022 ). Asami Mizukawa( Mari1 episode, 2022 ). Sôsuke Ikematsu( Mamoru1 episode, 2022 ). Atsuko Maeda( Sayaka1 episode, 2022 ). Karen Fukuhara( Tamami1 episode, 2022 ). Dante Basco( Rin1 episode, 2022 ). Halley Kim( Kaori1 episode, 2022 ). Ell( Mari1 episode, 2022 ). Jennie Kwan( Miss Miyuki1 episode, 2022 ). Tom Choi( Additional Voices1 episode, 2022 ). Monica Young( Akari1 episode, 2022 ). Yuuki Luna( Kana1 episode, 2022 ). Ryo Ishibashi( Hayami1 episode, 2022 ). Mitzi Akaha( Mickey1 episode, 2022 ). Keisuke Hoashi( Yoichi1 episode, 2022 ). Stephen Fu( Additional Voices1 episode, 2022 ). Dawn Anderson( Sara1 episode, 2022 ). Masataka Kubota( Rin1 episode, 2022 ). Ryô Narita( Kengo1 episode, 2022 ). Cory Yee( Yazawa1 episode, 2022 ). Kaho( Mai1 episode, 2022 ). Ron Song( Mr. Kim1 episode, 2022 ). Haru Kuroki( Tamami1 episode, 2022 ). James Taku Leung( Koji1 episode, 2022 ). Hiromi Nagasaku( Momoko1 episode, 2022 ). Elaine Wang( Yayoi1 episode, 2022 ). Yûsuke Santamaria( Yoichi1 episode, 2022 ). Ran Itô( Natsuko1 episode, 2022 ). Douglas Bennett( Bobunknown episodes ). Naomi Scott(unknown episodes)

Language English

Producers Koichi Murakami. Tatsuro Hayashi. Trish Hofmann. Nobuhiro Iizuka. Kôichirô Itô. Yukari Kiso. Yasushi Minatoya. Eiko Mizuno Gray. Hiroyuki Negishi. Atsuko Hirayanagi

Production Amazon Studios. Robot Communications.

Certificate 16+

Season 1

Total Episodes 7
